alert.note: Alert for Armstrong; Indiana; Jefferson (Pennsylvania) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Pittsburgh (Western Pennsylvania and East Central Ohio)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 01 at 10:44PM EDT by NWS Pittsburgh
info.description: ...STRONG THUNDERSTORMS WILL IMPACT NORTHEASTERN INDIANA... SOUTHEASTERN JEFFERSON AND EASTERN ARMSTRONG COUNTIES THROUGH 1115 PM EDT... At 1044 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Punxsutawney to 16 miles southeast of New Bethlehem to 9 miles northwest of Indiana. Movement was east at 50 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Punxsutawney, Big Run, Rossiter, Marion Center, Cherry Tree, Plumville, Glen Campbell, Atwood, Dixonville, Commodore, and Rochester Mills. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
